name: Frozen Yogurt-covered Strawberries Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: plain greek yogurt, honey, water, strawberry, almond
recipeIngredient: ¾ cup plain nonfat Greek yogurt
½ cup roasted, unsalted almonds, chopped
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine Greek yogurt, honey, and water in a small bowl and stir to combine.
Dip the strawberries into the yogurt mixture, ensuring they are fully coated.
Dip the yogurt-covered strawberries in the chopped almonds, and place on a parchment paper-lined sheet tray.
